name: FNavAgentProperties
doc: Properties of representation of an 'agent' (or Pawn) used by AI navigation/pathfinding.

AgentRadius: Radius of the capsule used for navigation/pathfinding.
AgentHeight: Total height of the capsule used for navigation/pathfinding.
AgentStepHeight: Step height to use, or -1 for default value from navdata's config.
NavWalkingSearchHeightScale: Scale factor to apply to height of bounds when searching for navmesh to project to when nav walking
PreferredNavData: Type of navigation data used by agent, null means "any"
bCanCrouch: If true, this Pawn is capable of crouching.
bCanJump: If true, this Pawn is capable of jumping.
bCanWalk: If true, this Pawn is capable of walking or moving on the ground.
bCanSwim: If true, this Pawn is capable of swimming or moving through fluid volumes.
bCanFly: If true, this Pawn is capable of flying.
